Shoreline.Central Washington University\u2013Lynnw:
Central Washington University–Lynnwood is Central Washington University's satellite campus in Lynnwood, Washington, United States.
Edmonds Community College and Central Washington University have worked together since 1975 to meet the higher education needs of Snohomish County. After earning a transfer degree online or on campus from any community college, students can continue their studies for a bachelor's degree from Central Washington University–Lynnwood in Snoqualmie Hall, a shared facility on the Edmonds CC campus.
